body: Prepare a reaction mixture:  27.5 μL of master mix \(0.05 units/μL Taq DNA Polymerase), 2.5 μL MgO nanoparticles \(2.48 mM), 0.4 mM dNTPs, 1 μM of each forward/reverse primer and 20 μL of template DNA per 50 μL reactions.
Keep the reaction mixture in a thermocycler.

Program the thermocycler as follows:
  3.1. Hold the sample at 95 <sup>◦</sup>C for 10 min


3.2. Denature step at 95 <sup>◦</sup>C for 15 sec


3.3. Anneal temperature of 65 <sup>◦</sup>C for 25 s 


3.4. Extend at 72 <sup>◦</sup>C for 15 sec


followed by a uniform three-step amplification profile for another 45 cycles, and finally held at 4 <sup>◦</sup>C.
